publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1271.1 Nicola Sturgeon: Primary Dental Care Servicesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1271) in the name of Susan Deacon, insert at end "and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward proposals for the abolition of charges for dental check-ups."
